entry.title: KRIYA CAPRI - (ULTRA HIGH-WAISTED)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leostar Athletic Wear
Type: Capris
Price: 58.00

Kriya Capris is an ultra high rise, 3/4 length Capri. Ultra high rise so it will sit high above the waist and 3/4 length to the mid-calf.  Side seam detail and tight fit. Inseam approximately 19 inches.

Made in Vancouver, B.C. Canada

Product Detail:
Ultra high rise. 3/4 length. Side seam detail. Tight fit. 

Nylon Supplex and Spandex
Four-way stretch
Breathable fabric
Moisture-wicking
Supplex (UPF 40 Sun Protection)
Scotchgard 3M (Moisture Management)
Cling and Pill Resistant/Shape Retention

[Best washed inside out in cold water. Hang dry or tumble dry on low setting.]

entry.title: AMELIA WAIST TRAINER SHORTS 9"
entry.summary:
Vendor: J76 Bamboo Wear/Leostar Athletic Wear
Type: Shorts
Price: 55.00

Amelia is a waist trainer - slims the tummy and controls the waistline while you work out. It is designed with adjustable rows of hook-eye closures for waist compression and helps tuck the tummy to help achieve a smaller waist. Made of highly elastic fabric that is strong but still soft and breathable. Meant to enhance workouts and physical activities and great for post partem wear. Ultra-high waist and unique waist design to help flatten and reshape with its sleek design. 

Model is 5'5/167cm with a 26" waist, wearing a size Medium.

Imported

Product Detail:
Inseam approx. 9". Ultra-High Waist. Tight fit and side seam. Inseam approximately 9 inches

Nylon Supplex and Spandex
Four-way stretch
Breathable fabric
Moisture-wicking
Supplex (UPF 40 Sun Protection)
Scotchgard 3M (Moisture Management)
Cling and Pill Resistant/Shape Retention

 [Best washed inside out in cold water. Hang dry or tumble dry on low setting.]

entry.title: SHELLEY WOVEN SHORT JOGGER
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leostar Athletic Wear
Type: Capris
Price: 65.00

Shelley is a sister capris version of the best-selling Stella. A favorite for its signature woven fabric that is lightweight, airy, and moisture-absorbent. Ideal for summer and especially for travel to tropical climates. Tapered design with secure zippered pocket and comfortable elastic waistband plus additional drawstring waist. Cuffed bottoms to wear higher or lower length as desired. Capri style. Relaxed fit.  inches. 

Model is 5'5/167cm with a 26" waist, wearing a size 2.

MADE IN VANCOUVER, B.C. CANADA

Product Detail:
Tapered leg. Side flap pocket. Elastic waistband. Drawstring. Cuffed bottoms. Capri style. Relaxed fit. Woven fabric. Inseam approximately 20 inches

Polyester and Spandex
Lightweight
Woven fabric
Two-way stretch
Breathable fabric
Moisture-wicking
Cool Comfort Technology
